property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: Pool Usable (GB)
property.description: Total space available within the pool.

property.name: Pool Used (GB)
property.description: Space allocated within the pool.

property.name: Pool Free (GB)
property.description: Unallocated space within the pool.

property.name: Free LUN (GB)
property.description: Capacity of LUNs that are not marked as used.

property.name: Pool Used Trend (GB)
property.description: Trend of pool capacity that has been masked and mapped, including local and remote copies.

property.name: % Pool Used
property.description: Percentage of pool capacity that is used.

property.name: Pool Subscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.name: % Pool Subscribed
property.description: Percentage of pool that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.name: Pool Oversubscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been oversubscribed by pool devices.

property.name: # Days Until Full
property.description: Projected number of weeks until full.
• Report created or modified by *SS*.

property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: Pool Usable (GB)
property.description: Total space available within the pool.

property.name: Pool Used (GB)
property.description: Space allocated within the pool.

property.name: Pool Free (GB)
property.description: Unallocated space within the pool.

property.name: Free LUN (GB)
property.description: Capacity of LUNs that are not marked as used.

property.name: Pool Used Trend (GB)
property.description: Trend of pool capacity that has been masked and mapped, including local and remote copies.

property.name: % Pool Used
property.description: Percentage of pool capacity that is used.

property.name: Pool Subscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.name: % Pool Subscribed
property.description: Percentage of pool that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.description: Projected number of weeks until full.

node.name: Storage Pools - Update each one (Link to below)

property.description: • Report created or modified by *SS*.

property.name: Array
property.description: User-defined name for the array (serial number).

property.name: Pool
property.description: System-defined pool name.

property.name: Pool Type
property.description: Type of pool.

property.name: Pool Usable (GB)
property.description: Total space available within the pool.

property.name: Pool Used (GB)
property.description: Space allocated within the pool.

property.name: Used for Block (GB)
property.description: Capacity that is made available to storage area network.

property.name: Used for File (GB)
property.description: Capacity that is made available to network attached storage.

property.name: Used for Virtual Storage (GB)
property.description: Capacity that is made available to virtual storage.

property.name: Pool Free (GB)
property.description: Unallocated space within the pool.

property.name: Free LUN (GB)
property.description: Capacity of LUNs that are not marked as used.

property.name: Pool Used Trend (GB)
property.description: Trend of pool capacity that has been masked and mapped, including local and remote copies.

property.name: % Pool Used
property.description: Percentage of pool capacity that is used.

property.name: Pool Subscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.name: % Pool Subscribed
property.description: Percentage of pool that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.name: Pool Oversubscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been oversubscribed by pool devices.

property.name: # Days Until Full
property.description: Projected number of weeks until full.

property.name: Disk Location
property.description: Indicates whether underlying disks are internal or external to array.
Details about the selected pool.

property.name: LUN
property.description: System-defined name or alias for the LUN.

property.name: LUN Type
property.description: Specifies the information about each LUN, which consists of the type of storage device and the protection type for that storage device, as applicable. Some examples include: VDEV, RAID-5, RAID-6, DLDEV, 2-Way Mir, RDF1+TDEV, RDF1+R-6.

property.name: Is Thinly Provisioned
property.description: Thin provisioned state. Possible values are Thick or Thin.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Total presented capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Used (GB)
property.description: Storage capacity that has been consumed by write operations.

property.name: Metadata Used (GB)
property.description: Pool overall metadata allocated capacity

property.name: Is Masked?
property.description: Masking state; Values are Yes, No.

property.name: Is Mapped?
property.description: Mapped state; Values are Yes, No.

property.name: Is Bound?
property.description: Bound to pool; Values are Yes, No.

property.name: Is Used?
property.description: Pool LUNs, system resources, mapped and masked thick LUNs, including local and remote copies. Values are Yes, No.

property.name: Purpose
property.description: Values are Primary, Local Replica, Remote Replica, System Resource.

node.name: CplxExp to File System / Flex Vols Consumers

property.name: File System
property.description: System-defined string for the File System.

property.name: File System Type
property.description: Specifies the information about each File System, which consists of the type of storage device and the protection type for that storage device, as applicable. Some examples include: VDEV, RAID-5, RAID-6, DLDEV, 2-Way Mir, RDF1+TDEV, RDF1+R-6.

property.name: Is Thinly Provisioned
property.description: Thin provisioned state. Possible values are Thick or Thin.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: Total capacity of the File System.

property.name: Presented Capacity (GB)
property.description: Array device capacity that can be presented to NAS or NetApp.

property.name: Used (GB)
property.description: Storage capacity that has been consumed by write operations.

property.name: Free (GB)
property.description: Storage capacity that has not been allocated.

property.name: Overhead Capacity (GB)
property.description: Pool space used for meta data or overhead.

property.name: Snapshot Capacity (GB)
property.description: Total capacity of Snapshot File System.

property.name: Snapshot Used Capacity (GB)
property.description: Allocated capacity of Snapshot File System.

property.name: LUN
property.description: System-defined name or alias for the LUN.

property.name: LUN Type
property.description: Specifies the information about each LUN, which consists of the type of storage device and the protection type for that storage device, as applicable. Some examples include: VDEV, RAID-5, RAID-6, DLDEV, 2-Way Mir, RDF1+TDEV, RDF1+R-6.

property.name: LUN Capacity (GB)
property.description: Total presented capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Disk Technology
property.description: Base storage architecture (ATA, SATA, SAS, Flash, FC).

property.name: Disk
property.description: Name assigned by the system.

property.name: Disk Technology
property.description: Base storage architecture (ATA, SATA, SAS, Flash, FC).

property.name: Disk Capacity (GB)
property.description: Capacity of the formatted physical disk.

property.name: Disk RPM
property.description: Speed of the disk.

property.name: Pool Enabled (GB)
property.description: Enabled pool capacity excluding disabled data devices.

property.name: Pool Overhead (GB)
property.description: Pool space used for meta data or overhead (not available for some storage system types).

property.name: Pool Subscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been subscribed by pool devices.

property.name: Pool Oversubscribed (GB)
property.description: Pool capacity that has been oversubscribed by pool devices.

property.name: Pool System Used (GB)
property.description: Capacity reserved for array internal operations (not available for some storage system types).

property.name: Snapshot Capacity (GB)
property.description: Snapshot total size (not available for some storage system types).

property.name: Snapshot Used Capacity (GB)
property.description: Snapshot allocated size (not available for some storage system types).

property.filterExpression: parttype=='Storage Pool' & devtype=='Array' & (name=='Capacity' | name=='FreeCapacity' | name=='UsedCapacity' | name=='SubscribedCapacity')
